Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\sujit\\source\\convex" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Excel UDF functions and form support for Phase 1-4 bond types

NewBondForm updates:
- Add Zero Coupon bond support with compounding selection
- Add US T-Bill support
- Add FRN support with spread, rate index, cap/floor options
- Add US Treasury FRN support
- Dynamic UI visibility based on bond type selection
- Fix control overlap issues in FRN options group

BondAnalyzerForm updates:
- Add callable bond analytics group \(YTW, workout date, OAS, eff duration/convexity\)
- Add FRN analytics group \(discount margin, simple margin\)
- Auto-detect bond type and show appropriate analytics
- Curve dropdown for OAS/DM calculations
- Fix control spacing in analytics groups

BondFunctions.cs - New Excel UDFs:
- CX.BOND.ZERO - Create zero coupon bond
- CX.BOND.TBILL - Create US Treasury Bill
- CX.BOND.FRN - Create floating rate note
- CX.BOND.TSYFRN - Create US Treasury FRN
- CX.YIELD.WORST - Yield to worst for callable bonds
- CX.WORKOUT.DATE - Workout date for YTW
- CX.OAS - Option-adjusted spread
- CX.SIMPLE.MARGIN - Simple margin for FRN
- CX.DISCOUNT.MARGIN - Discount margin \(Z-DM\) for FRN

ConvexDemo.xlsx updates:
- Add Callable sheet with YTW and OAS examples
- Add FRN sheet with margin calculation examples
- Update Bonds sheet with zero/FRN bond examples
- Update Reference sheet with compounding and rate index codes
